Charity Fund Svitlodar was founded on Oc: Charity Fund Svitlodar was founded on October 1, 2015. We started as volunteers helping the victims of the anti-terrorist operation (ATO) in the East of Ukraine in 2014.
A week ago, we received 4 tons of humani: A week ago, we received 4 tons of humanitarian aid from Germany - medicines, food, consumables for hospitals in Kharkiv, and very touching gifts from children for children.
Hope for the better future for Ukraine: Hope for the better future for Ukraine
Reliability, honesty and eagerness to he: Reliability, honesty and eagerness to help
If you need help, contact us in any way: If you need help, contact us in any way convenient for you
We help local residents of city of Khark: We help local residents of city of Kharkiv and Kharkiv region
This war has touched every Ukrainian fam: This war has touched every Ukrainian family and that is why our mission is so important.
Over ten million people have fled their: Over ten million people have fled their homes in Ukraine to other parts of the country or across the border since the Russia's invasion started, and this figure is growing every day.
Some refugees were forced to leave their: Some refugees were forced to leave their homes for the second time since the Donbas conflict in 2013-2014.
Even helping a few people a day would ma: Even helping a few people a day would make a huge difference for them and their families.
civilians in need during the military ho: civilians in need during the military hostilities in the area;
active military service people and membe: active military service people and members of their families;
families of murder victims and missing p: families of murder victims and missing persons.
We are providing humanitarian aid in the: We are providing humanitarian aid in the war zone and the adjacent territories:
food, medication and personal hygiene it: food, medication and personal hygiene items being delivered to people in need;
helping to relocate and evacuate people: helping to relocate and evacuate people and their pets to safer areas;
arranging distribution of medication to: arranging distribution of medication to local hospitals.
We are engaged in psychosomatic and soci: We are engaged in psychosomatic and social rehabilitation of victims. This was the main focus of the Foundation until February 2022, so we have proven proprietary methods.
All financial activities are absolutely: All financial activities are absolutely transparent and understandable for donors. A specific donation (money, food, medicine, etc.) can, at the request of the donor, be targeted or go to the general aid fund. Now the money is mainly spent on the purchase of prescription and non-European medicines, special food for sick children and fuel for the cars that deliver it all.
Our team consists of specialists who hav: Our team consists of specialists who have the necessary knowledge and experience, love their work. This allows us to effectively solve the tasks and achieve better results.
We work for the benefit of Ukrainian med: We work for the benefit of Ukrainian medicine. We do everything in our power to achieve our goals and objectives.
We are open to cooperation for the benef: We are open to cooperation for the benefit of our medical institutions. We value and respect all our partners and strive to make the interaction as comfortable and productive as possible.
Sorry, we are doing some work on this pa: Sorry, we are doing some work on this page
whatWeDoLvivLine2: Unfortunately, we are not able to share the posts every day because our reports on work completed are delayed.
whatWeDoLvivLine3: We express our sincere gratitude to the communities of Lviv, Zashkiv, Velykyi Hrybovychiv, village Zavadiv
whatWeDoLvivLine4: All your yummies were delivered to the guys at the front line!
whatWeDoFirstAidKidLine2: At this difficult time, every inhabitant of our country is trying to help the soldiers on the front line at no time.
whatWeDoFirstAidKidLine3: We have been staffing combat units and subdivisions territorial defense with taccal first aid kits from the first day of the war.
whatWeDoFirstAidKidLine4: Volunteers of the Svitlodar Fund provide the necessary medicines to the city's hospitals and areas.
